imdb.title: Kureimoa
imdb.plot: In a world rife with deadly creatures called "youma", a young silver eyed woman, Clare, works on behalf of an organization that trains female youma halfbreeds into warriors with the ability to destroy these creatures. Considered a...

episodes.title: Dai ken -Kureimoa-
episodes.plot: Clare continues her journey after ridding a village of Yoma. Raki, a boy exiled from the settlement, follows her and stirs dormant emotions in her Claymore heart.

episodes.title: Kuro no sho
episodes.plot: Raki learns more about the harsh realities of the Claymore way when a mysterious man tasks Clare with killing a fellow warrior who has reached the point of no return.

episodes.title: Ma horo ba no yami
episodes.plot: The shepherd of a holy city finds his flock falling victim to Yoma. Signs suggest the infestation could be even deadlier than normal, forcing Clare to put herself at risk and go undercover.

episodes.title: Kurea no kakusei
episodes.plot: Injured Clare devises a bold plan to expose the Yoma hidden within Rabona's sanctuaries. When the beast reveals itself, Clare will require a miracle if she is to retain her humanity.

episodes.title: Bishou mi no Teresa
episodes.plot: The history of Clare: Legendary Teresa of the Faint Smile is shaken by an encounter with a victim of unspeakable torture - a silent child who has been held captive by Yoma.

episodes.title: Teresa to Clare
episodes.plot: The history of Clare: Teresa's actions against a fellow Claymore leave her marked for death. Surrounded and set to be judged, she chooses a dangerous new code by which to live.

episodes.title: Shisha no rakuin
episodes.plot: The history of Clare: The five deadliest defenders of the Claymore way confront Teresa, unleashing a deafening swarm of lethal strokes.

episodes.title: Kakusei
episodes.plot: The history of Clare: Priscilla digs deeper into her rage during the fight against Teresa. When the violence ends, the Claymore called Clare begins her march to battle.

episodes.title: Kiri saku mono tachi: Part 1
episodes.plot: Clare joins a hunting party stalking an Awakened Being. Her new comrades fear Clare's weakness will place them in danger - especially when they see the monster they must engage in battle.

episodes.title: Kiri saku mono tachi: Part 2
episodes.plot: The battle against a rare male Awakened Being rages on a mountain from which no Claymore has ever returned. As flesh is torn, and despair sets in, Clare surprises her new comrades.

episodes.title: Kiri saku mono tachi: Part 3
episodes.plot: A shocking common bond is discovered among the members of the hunting party: each have toed the line that separates Claymore from Awakened - and some have even crossed it.

episodes.title: Hate naki bohyou: Part 1
episodes.plot: Clare's twisted new hunting partner, Ophelia, turns her malicious blade on Raki. The cruelty stirs the beast within Clare - much to Ophelia's glee.

episodes.title: Hate naki bohyou: Part 2
episodes.plot: Ophelia corners Clare high above a chasm which blocks any escape. As Clare's body is torn apart, she is saved by a figure from the painful past - but Ophelia's hunt is far from over.

episodes.title: Tatakau shikaku
episodes.plot: The secrets of Ilena'a Quick Sword will further Clare's quest for revenge in the future, but it might save her life in the present: Awakened Ophelia has located her prey.

episodes.title: Majo no agito: I
episodes.plot: Clare's search for Raki is interrupted when she hears of a cruel plot undertaken by a group of Awakened Beings. The beasts are torturing Claymores, hoping to make them Awaken against their will.

episodes.title: Majo no agito: II
episodes.plot: Riful reveals that a war between Awakened Beings is soon to erupt in the north. Clare is shocked to hear that Priscilla could be involved.

episodes.title: Majo no agito: III
episodes.plot: If Clare can land one blow against Riful, the Awakened Being will reveal more information about Priscilla. Miles away, a lumbering horde of towering madness is on the march.

episodes.title: Kita no senran: I
episodes.plot: An unstoppable army of Awakened Beings is slaughtering Claymores in distant snowy wastelands. The war for the northern territories begins.

episodes.title: Kita no senran: II
episodes.plot: The battle against Isleys's forces is underway and mutiny threatens the authority of Miria. The army of silver-eyed soldiers faces certain destruction.

episodes.title: Kita no senran: III
episodes.plot: The Claymores rest after the first battle, but the forces of evil unite with a singular purpose: In Isleys's name, erase every trace of Claymore and civilian from the city of Pieta and beyond.

episodes.title: Pieta shinkou: I
episodes.plot: The enemy makes a confusing tactical move, but the Claymores' disorientation turns into terror when a new foe - Rigaldo - unleashes his first strike.

episodes.title: Pieta shinkou: II
episodes.plot: Raki begins to understand Priscilla. In the same time, situation in Pietra becomes hopeless for claymores against silver lion king.

episodes.title: Rinkai ten: I
episodes.plot: Clare has evolved into a furious berserker in her fight against Rigaldo, and both warriors strike as if each blow is the last. The soldiers gathered on the battlefield watch in shock as a new legend is born.

episodes.title: Rinkai ten: II
episodes.plot: Priscilla recovers memory and feels Theresa in Claire. The two opponents decide to engage for final fight.

episodes.title: Dare ga tame ni
episodes.plot: Claire is overwhelmed and her comrades try to help her. But they don''t stand a chance against Priscilla.

episodes.title: Uketsugu mono he
episodes.plot: Near to death, Claire finds motivation to hurt Priscilla. Others parties intervene to save their lives.
